com.zello.sdk

Interface Events


  • public interface Events
    The Events interface enables monitoring of Zello SDK state and property changes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAppStateChanged()
      Called when the AppState changes.
      void onAudioStateChanged()
      Called when the the state of the Audio changes.
      void onContactsChanged()
      Called when the Contacts for the user changes.
      void onLastContactsTabChanged(Tab tab)
      Called when the last Contacts Tab changes.
      void onMessageStateChanged()
      Called when the state of either the MessageOut or MessageIn changes.
      void onMicrophonePermissionNotGranted()
      Called when an invocation of the Zello.beginMessage() method failed because the microphone permission hasn't been granted.
      void onSelectedContactChanged()
      Called when the selected contact changes.

    • Method Detail

      • onAppStateChanged

        void onAppStateChanged()

        Called when the AppState changes.

        This method is invoked on the UI thread. To retrieve the current AppState, call the Zello.getAppState(AppState) method.

        See Also:
        Zello.getAppState(AppState)

      • onAudioStateChanged

        void onAudioStateChanged()

        Called when the the state of the Audio changes.

        This method is invoked on the UI thread. To retrieve the current Audio, call the Zello.getAudio() method.

        See Also:
        Zello.getAudio()

      • onContactsChanged

        void onContactsChanged()

        Called when the Contacts for the user changes.

        This method is invoked on the UI thread. To retrieve the current Contacts snapshot, call the Zello.getContacts() method. The best approach, when dealing with large contact lists (in 1000s) is to run both getContacts() and any contact processing in a background thread, then post the result to UI thread for display.

        See Also:
        Zello.getContacts()

      • onLastContactsTabChanged

        void onLastContactsTabChanged(Tab tab)

        Called when the last Contacts Tab changes.

        This method is invoked on the UI thread.

        Parameters:
        tab - The tab that changed.
        See Also:
        Zello.selectContact(String, Tab[], Tab, Theme), Zello.selectContact(String, Tab[], Tab, Theme, Activity)

      • onMessageStateChanged

        void onMessageStateChanged()

        Called when the state of either the MessageOut or MessageIn changes.

        This method is invoked on the UI thread. To retrieve the current message state, call the Zello.getMessageIn(MessageIn) and Zello.getMessageOut(MessageOut) methods.

        See Also:
        Zello.getMessageIn(MessageIn), Zello.getMessageOut(MessageOut), Zello.beginMessage(), Zello.endMessage()

      • onMicrophonePermissionNotGranted

        void onMicrophonePermissionNotGranted()

        Called when an invocation of the Zello.beginMessage() method failed because the microphone permission hasn't been granted.

        This method is invoked on the UI thread.

        The normal use case for handling this error would be to call Zello.showMicrophonePermissionDialog(). However, it is the responsibility of the app using the SDK to determine if they should handle this error or not. For example, if there are multiple apps using the SDK, they will all receive this callback. The Zello.showMicrophonePermissionDialog() method should likely only be on one of these apps (the one in the foreground).

        See Also:
        Zello.showMicrophonePermissionDialog(Activity), Zello.showMicrophonePermissionDialog(), Zello.beginMessage()

      • onSelectedContactChanged

        void onSelectedContactChanged()

        Called when the selected contact changes.

        This method is invoked on the UI thread. To retrieve the newly selected contact, call the Zello.getSelectedContact(Contact) method.

        See Also:
        Zello.getSelectedContact(Contact), Zello.selectContact(String, Tab[], Tab, Theme), Zello.selectContact(String, Tab[], Tab, Theme, Activity), Zello.setSelectedContact(Contact), Zello.setSelectedUserOrGateway(String), Zello.setSelectedChannelOrGroup(String)
